Window.Name: bjxpbotsettings
Window.Title: Settings
Window.OnLoad:
declarevariable settingsvar int global ${This.ID}
declarevariable DisplayLooterCopper int global declarevariable DisplayLooterSilver int global declarevariable DisplayLooterGold int global declarevariable DisplayLooterPlatinum int global
declarevariable DisplayLooterSmall int global declarevariable DisplayLooterTreasure int global declarevariable DisplayLooterOrnate int global declarevariable DisplayLooterExquisite int global
declarevariable SetHomePoint bool global declarevariable HomePointLocation point3f global
declarevariable LooterPause bool global
SetHomePoint:Set[FALSE] LooterPause:Set[FALSE]

Text.name: SetVariables
Text.OnLoad: declare BJXPBotSettingsXMLXPos int global declare BJXPBotSettingsXMLYPos int global declare BJXPBotSettingsXMLXInc int global declare BJXPBotSettingsXMLYInc int global BJXPBotSettingsXMLXPos:Set[5] BJXPBotSettingsXMLYPos:Set[-10] BJXPBotSettingsXMLYInc:Set[25] BJXPBotSettingsXMLXInc:Set[55]
Text.OnUnLoad: deletevariable BJXPBotSettingsXMLXPos deletevariable BJXPBotSettingsXMLYPos deletevariable BJXPBotSettingsXMLXInc deletevariable BJXPBotSettingsXMLYInc

Button.Name: TabColumn1Button1
Button.OnLeftClick: This.Parent.FindChild[Potions_Frame]:Show This.Parent.FindChild[Exp_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Limits_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Debug_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Setup_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Statistics_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Looter_Frame]:Hide

Button.Name: TabColumn1Button2
Button.OnLeftClick: This.Parent.FindChild[Potions_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Exp_Frame]:Show This.Parent.FindChild[Limits_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Debug_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Setup_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Statistics_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Looter_Frame]:Hide

Button.Name: TabColumn1Button3
Button.OnLeftClick: This.Parent.FindChild[Potions_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Exp_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Limits_Frame]:Show This.Parent.FindChild[Debug_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Setup_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Statistics_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Looter_Frame]:Hide

Button.Name: TabColumn1Button6
Button.OnLeftClick: This.Parent.FindChild[Potions_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Exp_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Limits_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Debug_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Setup_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Statistics_Frame]:Show This.Parent.FindChild[Looter_Frame]:Hide

Button.Name: TabColumn1Button7
Button.OnLeftClick: This.Parent.FindChild[Potions_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Exp_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Limits_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Debug_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Setup_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Statistics_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Looter_Frame]:Show

Button.Name: TabColumn1Button5
Button.OnLeftClick: This.Parent.FindChild[Potions_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Exp_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Limits_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Debug_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Setup_Frame]:Show This.Parent.FindChild[Statistics_Frame]:Hide This.Parent.FindChild[Looter_Frame]:Hide

CommandButton.Name: RefreshInventoryButton
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Refreshes the contents of the player inventory and displays them in the box below.

listbox.name: FullInventoryListBox
listbox.OnLoad: declarevariable FullInventoryListBoxTextVar string global ${This.ID} declarevariable FullInventoryListBoxIDVar string global ${This.ID}

Text.name: InformationText
Text.Text: Double click a potion from the list on the left to move it to the list on the right. You can order the list on the right by clicking and dragging. To remove a potion, left click and then right click on it.

listbox.name: PotionPriorityListBox
listbox.OnLoad: declarevariable PotionPriorityListBoxTextVar string global ${This.ID} declarevariable PotionPriorityListBoxIDVar string global ${This.ID}

Text.name: XPTrackText
Text.Text: Choose which type of XP to track:

checkbox.name: EnableAdvXPCheckbox
checkbox.OnLeftClick:
This.Parent.FindChild[EnableTSXPCheckbox]:UnsetChecked This.Parent.FindChild[EnableAAXPCheckbox]:SetChecked
UIElement[${TSVitalityTextVar}]:Hide UIElement[${VitalityTextVar}]:Show UIElement[${ADVXpCalcText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${ADVXpCalcText1Var}]:Show UIElement[${ADVXPCalcPerHourText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${ADVXPCalcPerHourText1Var}]:Show UIElement[${AAXpCalcText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${AAXpCalcText1Var}]:Show UIElement[${AAXPCalcPerHourText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${AAXPCalcPerHourText1Var}]:Show UIElement[${TSXpCalcText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${TSXpCalcText1Var}]:Hide UIElement[${TSXPCalcPerHourText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${TSXPCalcPerHourText1Var}]:Hide

checkbox.name: EnableTSXPCheckbox
checkbox.OnLeftClick:
This.Parent.FindChild[EnableAdvXPCheckbox]:UnsetChecked This.Parent.FindChild[EnableAAXPCheckbox]:UnsetChecked
UIElement[${TSVitalityTextVar}]:Show UIElement[${VitalityTextVar}]:Hide UIElement[${ADVXpCalcText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${ADVXpCalcText1Var}]:Hide UIElement[${ADVXPCalcPerHourText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${ADVXPCalcPerHourText1Var}]:Hide UIElement[${AAXpCalcText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${AAXpCalcText1Var}]:Hide UIElement[${AAXPCalcPerHourText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${AAXPCalcPerHourText1Var}]:Hide UIElement[${TSXpCalcText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${TSXpCalcText1Var}]:Show UIElement[${TSXPCalcPerHourText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${TSXPCalcPerHourText1Var}]:Show

checkbox.name: EnableAAXPCheckbox
checkbox.OnLeftClick:
This.Parent.FindChild[EnableTSXPCheckbox]:UnsetChecked This.Parent.FindChild[EnableADVXPCheckbox]:SetChecked
UIElement[${TSVitalityTextVar}]:Hide UIElement[${VitalityTextVar}]:Show UIElement[${ADVXpCalcText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${ADVXpCalcText1Var}]:Show UIElement[${ADVXPCalcPerHourText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${ADVXPCalcPerHourText1Var}]:Show UIElement[${AAXpCalcText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${AAXpCalcText1Var}]:Show UIElement[${AAXPCalcPerHourText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${AAXPCalcPerHourText1Var}]:Show UIElement[${TSXpCalcText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${TSXpCalcText1Var}]:Hide UIElement[${TSXPCalcPerHourText2Var}]:Hide UIElement[${TSXPCalcPerHourText1Var}]:Hide

checkbox.name: EnableTimeLimitCheckbox
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Enter the time of day to end the script in the textfield. Must be in a 24 hour format.

Text.name: EnableTimeLimitText
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter the time of day to end the script in the textfield. Must be in a 24 hour format.

TextEntry.Name: UserEndTimeEntry
TextEntry.AutoTooltip: Enter the time of day to end the script in the textfield. Must be in a 24 hour format.

Text.name: EnableTimeLimitText2
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter the time of day to end the script in the textfield. Must be in a 24 hour format.

checkbox.name: EnableADVLevelLimitCheckbox
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Enter an ADV level to perform the options below.

Text.name: EnableADVLevelLimitText
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter an ADV level to perform the options below.

TextEntry.Name: LevelAdvLimitEntry
TextEntry.AutoTooltip: Enter a level to end the script in the boxes.

checkbox.name: EnableAASliderBar1LimitCheckbox
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Enables the changing of the AA slider bar when ADV limit is reached.

Text.name: EnableAASliderBar1LimitText
Text.Text: When ADV Limit has been reached, change the AA slider bar to

TextEntry.Name: EnableAASliderBar1LimitTextEntry
TextEntry.AutoTooltip: Enter the percentage to change the AA slider bar to.

checkbox.name: EnableAALevelLimitCheckbox
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Enter an AA level to perform the options below.

Text.name: EnableAALevelLimitText
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter an AA level to perform the options below.

TextEntry.Name: LevelAALimitEntry
TextEntry.AutoTooltip: Enter a level to end the script in the boxes.

Text.name: EnableLevelLimitText3
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter a level to end the script in the boxes.

checkbox.name: EnableAASliderBar2LimitCheckbox
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Enables the changing of the AA slider bar when AA limit is reached.

Text.name: EnableAASliderBar2LimitText
Text.Text: When AA Limit has been reached, change the AA slider bar to

TextEntry.Name: EnableAASliderBar2LimitTextEntry
TextEntry.AutoTooltip: Enter the percentage to change the AA slider bar to.

checkbox.name: EnableTSLevelLimitCheckbox
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Enter an TS level to perform the options below.

Text.name: EnableTSLevelLimitText
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter a TS level to perform the options below.

TextEntry.Name: LevelTSLimitEntry
TextEntry.AutoTooltip: Enter a TS level to end the script in the boxes.

Text.name: EnableTSLevelLimitText3
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter a TS level to end the script in the boxes.

checkbox.name: EnableSoundLimitCheckbox
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Plays a sound when any limit is reached.

Text.name: EnableSoundLimitText
Text.Text: Play a sound when any limit is reached

checkbox.name: EnableLimitDropboxCheckbox
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Enables selecting what to do when a limit is reached from the dropbox.

Text.name: EnableLimitDropboxText
Text.Text: When any Limit has been reached perform the following command:

checkbox.name: EnableIRCRelayCheckbox
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Enables the irc relay script, which posts level/aa gain in an irc channel.

Text.name: EnableIRCRelayText
Text.AutoTooltip: Enables the irc relay script, which posts level/aa gain in an irc channel.

Text.name: IRCServerText
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter the irc server you want to connect to. (IE. irc.lavishsoft.com)

TextEntry.Name: IRCServerTextEntry
TextEntry.AutoTooltip: Enter the irc server you want to connect to. (IE. irc.lavishsoft.com)

Text.name: IRCChannelText
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter the irc channel you want to connect to starting with #. (IE. #leveling)

TextEntry.Name: IRCChannelTextEntry
TextEntry.AutoTooltip: Enter the irc channel you want to connect to starting with #. (IE. #leveling)

Text.name: IRCNicknameSuffixText
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter the irc nickname suffix you want to use. (IE. _grindinghard)

TextEntry.Name: IRCNicknameSuffixTextEntry
TextEntry.AutoTooltip: Enter the irc nickname suffix you want to use. (IE. _grindinghard)

Text.name: EnableLootText
Text.Text: Check the boxes below to enable looting for:

Text.name: LooterLootedCoinText
Text.OnRender: This:SetText[Amount of Looted Coin: P = ${DisplayLooterPlatinum.LeadingZeroes[1]} G = ${DisplayLooterGold.LeadingZeroes[2]} S = ${DisplayLooterSilver.LeadingZeroes[2]} C = ${DisplayLooterCopper.LeadingZeroes[2]}]

CommandButton.Name: StopLooterButton
CommandButton.OnLeftClick: if ${Script[bjlooter](exists)} endscript bjlooter eq2press -release w This.Parent.FindChild[StartLooterButton]:Show This:Hide

TextEntry.Name: CurrentMaxAdvLevelEntry
CurrentMaxTSLevelEntry

combobox.name: PowerlevelerComboBox
combobox.OnLeftClick: This:ClearItems if ${Me.GroupCount} < 2 { This:AddItem[${Me.Group[0]},2] } elseif ${Me.GroupCount} < 3 { This:AddItem[${Me.Group[0]},2] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[1]},3] } elseif ${Me.GroupCount} < 4 { This:AddItem[${Me.Group[0]},2] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[1]},3] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[2]},4] } elseif ${Me.GroupCount} < 5 { This:AddItem[${Me.Group[0]},2] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[1]},3] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[2]},4] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[3]},5] } elseif ${Me.GroupCount} < 6 { This:AddItem[${Me.Group[0]},2] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[1]},3] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[2]},4] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[3]},5] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[4]},6] } else { This:AddItem[${Me.Group[0]},2] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[1]},3] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[2]},4] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[3]},5] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[4]},6] This:AddItem[${Me.Group[5]},7] } UIElement[PowerlevelerComboBox@Setup_Frame@bjxpbotsettings]:SetAutoSort[TRUE] UIElement[PowerlevelerComboBox@Setup_Frame@bjxpbotsettings]:SetSortType[text] UIElement[PowerlevelerComboBox@Setup_Frame@bjxpbotsettings]:Sort

Text.name: PowerlevelerOptionsText
Text.Text: When the "Powerlevler" dies perform the following action:

Text.name: EnableSelfReviveOptionsText2
Text.Text: When you die, perform the following action:
